apiClassifier.shortdesc: A utility class to work with implementations of the IList interface.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A utility class to work with implementations of the IList interface.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: ListUtil is a static class and shouldn't be instantiated.

apiException.apiDesc: ListUtil is a static class and shouldn't be instantiated.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: ListUtil is a static class and shouldn't be instantiated.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a new TypedList with the wrapList argument wrapped.

apiException.apiDesc: if the wrapList argument is null.
if the type argument is null.
if the types of one or more elements in the wrapList argument are incompatible with the type argument.

apiReturn.apiDesc: a new TypedList with the wrapList argument wrapped.

apiParam.apiDesc: the target list to be wrapped by the TypedList.
the type of the elements allowed by the returned TypedList.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a new TypedList with the wrapList argument wrapped.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a new TypedSortedList with the wrapList argument wrapped.

apiException.apiDesc: if the wrapList argument is null.
if the type argument is null.

apiReturn.apiDesc: a new TypedSortedList with the wrapList argument wrapped.

apiParam.apiDesc: the target list to be wrapped by the TypedSortedList.
the type of the elements allowed by the returned TypedSortedList.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a new TypedSortedList with the wrapList argument wrapped.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a new UniqueSortedList with the wrapList argument wrapped.

apiException.apiDesc: if the wrapList argument is null.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a new UniqueSortedList with the wrapList argument wrapped.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a new TypedList that wraps a new UniqueList that wraps the wrapList argument.

apiException.apiDesc: if the wrapList argument is null.
if the type argument is null.
if the types of one or more elements in the wrapList argument are incompatible with the type argument.

apiReturn.apiDesc: a new TypedList that wraps a new UniqueList that wraps the wrapList argument.

apiParam.apiDesc: the target list to be wrapped.
the type of the elements allowed by the returned TypedList.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Returns a new TypedList that wraps a new UniqueList that wraps the wrapList argument.
The result will be a unique and typed array list, despite of the return type TypedList.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a new TypedSortedList that wraps a new UniqueSortedList that wraps the wrapList argument.

apiException.apiDesc: if the wrapList argument is null.
if the type argument is null.
if the types of one or more elements in the wrapList argument are incompatible with the type argument.

the type of the elements allowed by the returned TypedSortedList.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Returns a new TypedSortedList that wraps a new UniqueSortedList that wraps the wrapList argument.
The result will be a unique and typed sorted list, despite of the return type TypedSortedList.

apiParam.apiDesc: the target queue to be wrapped by the TypedQueue.
the type of the elements allowed by the returned TypedQueue.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a new UniqueQueue with the wrapQueue argument wrapped.

apiException.apiDesc: if the queue argument is null.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a new TypedQueue that wraps a new UniqueQueue that wraps the wrapQueue argument.

apiException.apiDesc: if the queue argument is null.
if the type argument is null.
if the types of one or more elements in the wrapQueue argument are incompatible with the type argument.

apiReturn.apiDesc: a new TypedQueue with the queue argument wrapped.

apiParam.apiDesc: the target queue to be wrapped.
the type of the elements allowed by the returned TypedQueue.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A utility class to work with implementations of the IMap interface.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A utility class to work with implementations of the IMap interface.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: MapUtil is a static class and shouldn't be instantiated.

apiException.apiDesc: MapUtil is a static class and shouldn't be instantiated.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: MapUtil is a static class and shouldn't be instantiated.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Performs an arbitrary, specific evaluation of equality between this object and the other object.

apiReturn.apiDesc: true if the arbitrary evaluation considers the objects equal.

apiParam.apiDesc: the first map.
the second map.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Performs an arbitrary, specific evaluation of equality between this object and the other object. If one of the maps or both maps are null it will be returned false.
Two different objects are considered equal if:
object A and object B are instances of the same class (i.e. if they have exactly the same type)
object A contains all mappings of object B
object B contains all mappings of object A
mappings have exactly the same order
This implementation takes care of the order of the mappings in the maps. So, for two maps are equal the order of entries returned by the iterator object must be equal.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Performs an arbitrary, specific evaluation of equality between this object and the other object.

apiReturn.apiDesc: true if the arbitrary evaluation considers the objects equal.

apiParam.apiDesc: the first map.
the second map.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Performs an arbitrary, specific evaluation of equality between this object and the other object. If one of the maps or both maps are null it will be returned false.
Two different objects are considered equal if:
object A and object B are instances of the same class (i.e. if they have exactly the same type)
object A contains all mappings of object B
object B contains all mappings of object A
This implementation does not takes care of the order of the mappings in the map.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Feeds argument map with argument list.

apiParam.apiDesc: the map to be fed.
the list to retrieve entries.
if true performs a type coercion to Boolean if some String is "true" or "false", or a type coercion to Number if some String is a Number (i.e. !isNaN(Number(string)) == true).

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Feeds argument map with argument list.
The name of the nodes become keys and the values of the nodes become values of the IMap object.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a new TypedListMap with the wrapMap argument wrapped.

apiException.apiDesc: if the wrapMap argument is null.

the type of the keys allowed by the returned TypedListMap.
the type of the values allowed by the returned TypedListMap.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a new TypedListMap with the wrapMap argument wrapped.

apiParam.apiDesc: the target map to be wrapped by the TypedMap.
the type of the keys allowed by the returned TypedMap.
the type of the values allowed by the returned TypedMap.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a new TypedMap with the wrapMap argument wrapped.

apiException.apiDesc: if the wrapMap argument is null.

apiParam.apiDesc: the target map to be wrapped by the TypedSortedMap.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a new TypedSortedMap with the wrapMap argument wrapped.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the string representation of the map argument.

apiReturn.apiDesc: the string representation of the target map.

apiParam.apiDesc: the target map.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the string representation of the map argument.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A utility class to work with implementations of the ICollection interface.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
A utility class to work with implementations of the ICollection interface.
CollectionUtil handles null input collections quietly in almost all methods. When not, it's documented in the method. That is to say that a null input will not thrown an error in almost all methods.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: CollectionUtil is a static class and shouldn't be instantiated.

apiException.apiDesc: CollectionUtil is a static class and shouldn't be instantiated.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: CollectionUtil is a static class and shouldn't be instantiated.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns true if the collection contains only elements of the type argument.

apiReturn.apiDesc: true if the collection contains only elements of the type argument. If the collection is null or empty returns false.

apiParam.apiDesc: the collection to check. May be null.
the type of the elements.
defines if the type of the elements should be strictly equal.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Returns true if the collection contains only elements of the type argument.
This method uses org.as3utils.ArrayUtil.containsOnlyType()

apiOperation.shortdesc: Performs an arbitrary, specific evaluation of equality between the two arguments.

apiReturn.apiDesc: true if the arbitrary evaluation considers the objects equal.

apiParam.apiDesc: the first collection.
the second collection.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Performs an arbitrary, specific evaluation of equality between the two arguments. If one of the collections or both collections are null it will be returned false.
Two different objects are considered equal if:
object A and object B are instances of the same class (i.e. if they have exactly the same type)
object A contains all elements of object B
object B contains all elements of object A
elements have exactly the same order
This implementation takes care of the order of the elements in the collections. So, for two collections are equal the order of elements returned by the iterator object must be equal.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Performs an arbitrary, specific evaluation of equality between this object and the other object.

apiReturn.apiDesc: true if the arbitrary evaluation considers the objects equal.

apiParam.apiDesc: the first collection.
the second collection.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Performs an arbitrary, specific evaluation of equality between this object and the other object. If one of the collections or both collections are null it will be returned false.
Two different objects are considered equal if:
object A and object B are instances of the same class (i.e. if they have exactly the same type)
object A contains all elements of object B
object B contains all elements of object A
This implementation does not takes care of the order of the elements in the collections.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the collection object containing only objects of the type of the type argument.

apiReturn.apiDesc: the collection object containing only objects of the type of the type argument.

apiParam.apiDesc: the collection for filtering. May be null.
the type of the objects that should remain in the collection.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Returns the collection object containing only objects of the type of the type argument.
This method modifies the original collection. Be sure that it's not a ready-only collection.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the index position of the largest number in the specified collection.

apiReturn.apiDesc: the index position of the largest number in the collection object. If the collection argument is null or empty then the return is -1.

apiParam.apiDesc: the collection object to check. May be null.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the index position of the largest number in the specified collection.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the largest number in the specified collection.

apiReturn.apiDesc: the largest number in the collection object. If the collection argument is null or empty then the return is NaN.

apiParam.apiDesc: the collection object to check. May be null.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the largest number in the specified collection.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Removes all occurances of a the given element argument from the given collection argument.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Removes all occurances of a the given element argument from the given collection argument.
This method modifies the original collection. Be sure that it's not a ready-only collection.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Removes duplicated objects.

apiReturn.apiDesc: the collection object without duplicated objects.

apiParam.apiDesc: the collection to remove duplicated objects.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Removes duplicated objects.
This method modifies the original collection. Be sure that it's not a ready-only collection.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Shuffles the position of the elements of the given collection.

apiReturn.apiDesc: the modified collection.

apiParam.apiDesc: the collection to shuffle. May be null.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Shuffles the position of the elements of the given collection.
This method modifies the original collection. Be sure that it's not a ready-only collection.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sorts the collection of objects alphabetically through the object's property.

apiReturn.apiDesc: the sorted collection.

apiParam.apiDesc: the collection to sort.
the name of the property to be recovered and compared between the objects.
indicates which type of comparison will be used.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Sorts the collection of objects alphabetically through the object's property.
This method uses the org.as3coreaddendum.utils.ArrayUtil.sortAlphabeticallyByObjectProperty method.
This method modifies the original collection. Be sure that it's not a ready-only collection.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sorts the collection of String objects alphabetically.

apiReturn.apiDesc: the sorted collection.

apiParam.apiDesc: the collection to sort.
indicates which type of comparison will be used.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Sorts the collection of String objects alphabetically.
This method uses the org.as3coreaddendum.utils.ArrayUtil.sortAlphabetically method.
This method modifies the original collection. Be sure that it's not a ready-only collection.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sorts the collection of objects ascending through the object's property (must be a numeric value).

apiReturn.apiDesc: the sorted collection.

apiParam.apiDesc: the collection to sort.
the name of the property to be recovered and compared between the objects.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Sorts the collection of objects ascending through the object's property (must be a numeric value).
This method uses the org.as3coreaddendum.utils.ArrayUtil.sortAscendingByObjectProperty method.
This method modifies the original collection. Be sure that it's not a ready-only collection.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sorts the collection of Number objects ascending.

apiReturn.apiDesc: the sorted collection.

apiParam.apiDesc: the collection to sort.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Sorts the collection of Number objects ascending.
This method uses the org.as3coreaddendum.utils.ArrayUtil.sortAscending method.
This method modifies the original collection. Be sure that it's not a ready-only collection.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sorts the array of objects descending through the object's property (must be a numeric value).

apiReturn.apiDesc: the sorted collection.

apiParam.apiDesc: the collection to sort.
the name of the property to be recovered and compared between the objects.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Sorts the array of objects descending through the object's property (must be a numeric value).
This method uses the org.as3coreaddendum.utils.ArrayUtil.sortDescendingByObjectProperty method.
This method modifies the original collection. Be sure that it's not a ready-only collection.

apiReturn.apiDesc: the sorted collection.

apiParam.apiDesc: the collection to sort.

Sorts the array of Number objects descending.
This method uses the org.as3coreaddendum.utils.ArrayUtil.sortDescending method.
This method modifies the original collection. Be sure that it's not a ready-only collection.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the string representation of the collection argument.

apiReturn.apiDesc: the string representation of the target collection.

apiParam.apiDesc: the target collection.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the string representation of the collection argument.
